text: emi? Evadaite allah yandu gala bhayabhaktulu mariyu ayana priti, punadula mida tana (masjid) kattadanni kattado, atadu sresthuda? Leka, tana kattadapu punadulanu, varadalaku kulipoyi dani krindi bhagam khaliga unna nadi odduna kattevada? Adi vanito saha narakagniloki kottukoni potundi. Mariyu allah durmargulaku sanmargam cupadu
